cells.data:
These notes are for preparing a webinar that introduces OpenShift to participants of a hackathon.

The introduction of OpenShift to hackathon members is in some way comparable with app dev conversations at customers, but it difers in several details:
  • The webinar participants want to see how much effort it takes getting to productive hacking.
  • They want to understand how difficult and error prone the underlying stack is.
  • They want to know if critical functionality for their product us supported (e.g. push notifications, ML, specific languages/frameworks).
  • They want to be able comparing the technical offing to RH competitors.

Introduce all team members.
  • Onsite: Name and Photo
  • Dedicated Offsite: Name and Photo
  • Team Offsite: Name of the team, purpose.
Short introduction Ã  la "OpenShift for Developers" (Dumbleton/Shipley):
